tamp
==============

tamp is a


Features
========

Installation
============

tamp requires Python ``>=3.8`` and can be installed via:

.. code-block:: bash

   python -m pip install git+https://github.com/BrianPugh/tamp.git


Usage
=====

.. code-block:: python

   import tamp
